/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.jumptocontainer { position: relative; display: none; }

.jumptocontainer.shown { display: block !important; }

.block-system-menu-blockjump-to { display: none; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to { position: absolute; top: auto; left: 0; width: 100%; z-index: 2; background: #FFFFFF; box-shadow: 0 0 5px #BFBFBF; } }

@media (min-width: 768px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to { display: block !important; } }

.block-system-menu-blockjump-to header { font-size: 16px; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 20px; line-height: 1.25rem; margin: 0 0 1rem; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to header { display: none; } }

.block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu { margin-bottom: -1.25rem; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu { padding: .563rem 1.063rem 1.6rem 2.813rem; } }

@media (min-width: 768px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu { border-top: 1px solid #AEB0B5; padding-top: 1rem; } }

.block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu .nav-item { flex: none; display: block; width: 100%; text-align: left; }

@media (min-width: 768px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu .nav-item { text-align: center; width: auto; }
  .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu .nav-item:first-child a { margin-left: 0; }
  .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu .nav-item:last-child a { margin-right: 0; } }

.block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a, .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:active { position: relative; font-size: .9rem; padding: 3px 0; color: #212121; }

.block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:after, .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:active:after { background-image: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/fa_arrow_down.svg"); color: #0071BC; content: ''; bottom: 0.55em; height: 18px; left: 100%; line-height: initial; position: absolute; transform: translateX(-50%); width: 18px; margin-left: 15px; }

@media (min-width: 768px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:after, .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:active:after { bottom: 0.5rem; left: 50%; margin: 0; } }

@media (min-width: 768px) { .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a, .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:active { box-shadow: 0 0 5px #AEB0B5; color: #FFFFFF; height: 140px; letter-spacing: 0.05rem; line-height: 1.3rem; margin: 0 0.5rem 1rem; opacity: 0.8; text-decoration: none !important; text-transform: uppercase; padding: 2.8rem 0.8rem 0; position: relative; width: 205px; }

  .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:hover:after, .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:focus:after, .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:active:hover:after, .block-system-menu-blockjump-to ul.nav.menu a:active:focus:after { background-image: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/fa_arrow_down_white.svg"); color: #FFFFFF; }
